description: Fired when a withdraw is made in the MemeCooking protocol.
sql_insert: INSERT INTO memecooking_withdraw (timestamp, transaction_id, receipt_id, block_height, trader, meme_id, amount, fee) SELECT to_timestamp((value->>'block_timestamp_nanosec')::bigint / 1000000000.0), value->>'transaction_id', value->>'receipt_id', (value->>'block_height')::bigint, value->>'trader', (value->>'meme_id')::bigint, (value->>'amount')::numeric, (value->>'fee')::numeric FROM jsonb_array_elements($1);

endpoints.query: SELECT json_build_object('id', id, 'timestamp', timestamp, 'transaction_id', transaction_id, 'receipt_id', receipt_id, 'block_height', block_height, 'trader', trader, 'meme_id', meme_id, 'amount', amount, 'fee', fee) FROM memecooking_withdraw WHERE (($1->>'before_id')::bigint IS NULL OR id < ($1->>'before_id')::bigint) ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 50;

SELECT json_build_object('id', id, 'timestamp', timestamp, 'transaction_id', transaction_id, 'receipt_id', receipt_id, 'block_height', block_height, 'trader', trader, 'meme_id', meme_id, 'amount', amount, 'fee', fee) FROM memecooking_withdraw WHERE (($1->>'after_id')::bigint IS NULL OR id > ($1->>'after_id')::bigint) ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 50;

SELECT json_build_object('id', id, 'timestamp', timestamp, 'transaction_id', transaction_id, 'receipt_id', receipt_id, 'block_height', block_height, 'trader', trader, 'meme_id', meme_id, 'amount', amount, 'fee', fee) FROM memecooking_withdraw WHERE trader = ($1->>'trader') AND (($1->>'before_id')::bigint IS NULL OR id < ($1->>'before_id')::bigint) ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 50;

SELECT json_build_object('id', id, 'timestamp', timestamp, 'transaction_id', transaction_id, 'receipt_id', receipt_id, 'block_height', block_height, 'trader', trader, 'meme_id', meme_id, 'amount', amount, 'fee', fee) FROM memecooking_withdraw WHERE meme_id = ($1->>'meme_id')::bigint AND (($1->>'before_id')::bigint IS NULL OR id < ($1->>'before_id')::bigint) ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 50;
